short_summary: tagging of herring using acoustic transmitters
full_summary:
Chartering of a Specialized Vessel for Purse Seine Fishing
--------------------------------------------------------

### Title and Reference

* Title: Chartering of a Vessel Specialized in Purse Seine Fishing to Catch Live Herring in the Western Sector of NAFO Division 4S
* Reference Number: CB-987-85764421
* Solicitation Number: 30005801
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: 2024-05-23
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-06-10 14:00:00 (Expired)
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-06-24
* Expected Contract End Date: 2025-04-30

### Description

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the chartering of a vessel specialized in purse seine fishing to catch live herring in the western sector of NAFO Division 4S. The contractor will be responsible for coordinating fishing activities, assisting DFO staff in handling live specimens, and providing additional support as required.

### Mandatory Requirements

The contractor must:

1. Coordinate fishing activities
2. Assist DFO staff in handling live specimens
3. Assist DFO staff in taking biological measurements of fishing samples and entering data
4. Deploy and retrieve acoustic release receivers at designated stations
5. Freeze herring samples on board the vessel
6. Provide two water tanks of approximately 800 liters (Xactic) and feed them with fresh seawater

### Conditionally Set-Aside Under the PSBI

This tender is open to all qualified bidders; however, it will be conditionally set-aside under the Government of Canada's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) if two or more bids have been received by Indigenous businesses who are certified under the PSIB criteria and listed in the Government of Canada's Indigenous Business Directory.

### Contracting Entity

* Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* Address: 301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, New Brunswick E3C 2M6 Canada
* Contact: Karen Dolan, Phone: (782) 377-7245, Email: [karen.dolan@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:karen.dolan@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)

### Bid Documents

The bid documents are available for download from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38717/30005801---rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada
